description: This file defines a UI component called 'Button' using LightningJS framework. It manages an internal 'isFavorited' state and updates displayed text accordingly. It supports user interaction through the 'enter' input to toggle the state.

classes.name: Button
classes.description: A LightningJS component representing a toggleable button with dynamic text based on internal state.

methods.name: state
methods.description: Initializes the component's internal state and text labels.

methods.name: input.enter
methods.description: Handles the 'enter' input event to toggle the 'isFavorited' state.
